name: RobotBattle
description:
Game Concept

The idea of the game is to design a better robot, this is achieved  by creating your own robot and putting to the test on the test battle field.  If its the last robot standing you have achieved a better robot, congratulations. 

Designing a Robot

Its in the create Robot menu the challenge begins, here you can design a robot as to how many move commands and how and when to turn either the robot and or the turret.  And whether you decide to drop mines and or shoot once in a while etc 

Once you have created a robot, you can  then exit out and from the main page save the robot and load all robots then put it to the test. 

 Robot1 is your robot name

Example Robot

As an example a robot program might include two move forwards a turn clockwise and a shoot this enables it to move in a clockwork style and shoot after it has moved and turned. Try your own combinations of creating a robot, but remember to save from the main menu and load all robots again. 

The next step is to test the robot, now it's just a matter of watching and waiting until the end of the battle.
